overview: Hamburg in the 20s - while the city is brought to its knees by a storm, a man makes his way purposefully through the streets, driven by his biggest longing - Love. On this night, the search for his big love leads him to a hospital. Overjoyed to have found his man alive, his joy was short lived because the man claimed he didn't know him. Where does truth begin and longing end? As the dull throbbing of pain overcame both, destiny played its hand and ensured there was no way back.
title: Im Sturm
